Important change to your NCS Information Evening Hey {!Contact.FirstName},
The date of your Information Evening has changed. Please see below for your updated details:
Date: Monday 25 July 2016 Time: 6:30pm Address: Queen's Crescent Community Association, 45 Ashdown Crescent, London, NW5 4QE
Please let us know if you’re coming by emailing Nicole at nicole.koutzas@the-challenge.org - or you can call or text her on 07469151475. Please include the name of your teenager in your reply.
We're really sorry if this has caused any inconvenience.
If you can’t make it but would still like to meet us, we’ll be holding other information evenings for NCS programmes running in different areas, or on different dates. Please contact Nicole for details.
We hope you can make it to your information evening and we look forward to seeing you.
